forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening, then fog developing overnight. Low around 40F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with some morning fog. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 47F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening, then fog developing overnight. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
